data.name: Real Estate Basics
data.text: Real estate investing involves purchasing and managing property to generate income or profit. Before investing, research the market and analyze potential returns. Additionally, consider the risks associated with investing in real estate.

questions.text: What should you do before investing in real estate?
What should you consider before investing in real estate?

data.name: Financing Real Estate
data.text: Real estate investing often requires a significant amount of money. Consider various financing options, such as a mortgage or partnership, to fund your investment. Additionally, be prepared to cover additional costs, such as property taxes and maintenance.

questions.text: What should you consider when financing a real estate investment?
What are some financing options for real estate investing?
What additional costs should you be prepared to cover when investing in real estate?
